name: VGP Import Export for Autolynk in WooCommerce
author: VGP Media

sections.description:
The VGP Import Export for Autolynk in WooCommerce plug-in bridges the gap between An Post’s Autolynk software and WooCommerce. Using this plug-in you can vastly speed up the shipping of customer orders and avoid manual data entry for tracking numbers. All this while taking advantage of An Post’s great national and international postage rates for smaller packages.

What is Autolynk?

Autolynk is a software package provided by An Post, the national Post Office of the Republic of Ireland, to small and medium businesses. The software prints pre-paid shipping labels for your national and international customers. To get Autolynk, please contact your An Post account manager.

How to set up the plug-in

Please follow the quick start guide here

An Post and WooCommerce are trademarks of their respective owners. This plug-in is NOT an official An Post product, please do not ask An Post for support with this plugin.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

Go to Plugins > Add New from your WP admin menu, search for Woo WC Autolynk Export Import
, install, and activate.

Manual Installation

Download the plugin and unzip it.
Upload the plugin folder to your wp-content/plugins folder.
Activate the plugin from the plugins page in the admin.
sections.changelog:
1.0.6

  • Major update, please download new import sequence file from vgpmedia.ie website.
  • Various bugs fixed.
  • Northern Ireland converted from XI to XA automatically in export file.
  • Code added to handle customs declarations. However since An Post are abandoning Autolynk this information is not processed correctly by Autolynk itself.
  • This is likely to be the last version of the plugin since An Post are retiring Autolynk in favour of their new web-based e-commerce hub. Users must switch to e-commerce hub in order to satisfy new electronic customs regulations. Ask your account manager for more details.

1.0.5

  • Major update, please download new import sequence file from vgpmedia.ie website.
  • Various bugs fixed.
  • Northern Ireland converted from XI to XA automatically in export file.
  • Code added to handle customs declarations. However since An Post are abandoning Autolynk this information is not processed correctly by Autolynk itself.

1.0.4

  • Bug Fixing.

1.0.3

  • Bug Fixing.

1.0.2

  • Bug Fixing.

1.0.1

  • Bug Fixing.

1.0.0

  • First version.

short_description: This is a plugin for Wordpress and WooCommerce that will automate the production of shipping labels within AnPost’s AutoLynk software.
